com.google.code.rees.scope
Class HashMonitoredContext<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.HashMap<K,V>
          com.google.code.rees.scope.HashMonitoredContext<K,V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
MonitoredContext<K,V>, Serializable, Cloneable, Map<K,V>
public class HashMonitoredContext<K,V>
extends HashMap<K,V>
implements MonitoredContext<K,V>

A Hash implementation of the MonitoredContext. Resets its own remaining time whenever the wrapped HashMap is accessed.

Author:
rees.byars
See Also:
com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation.MonitoredConversationContextFactory MonitoredConversationContextFactory}, Serialized Form

Method Detail

init

public void init(String monitoredContextId,
                 Map<String,Object> sessionContext,
                 long duration)
Initialize the context with the given parameters. The monitoredContextId should be the key by which this context is retrieved from the sessionContext. The duration is the period of inactivity after which this context should be destroyed.

Specified by:
init in interface MonitoredContext<K,V>
